info.title: Navigate forwards into a checkbox group

setupScript.name: moveFocusBeforeFirstCheckbox
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the first checkbox
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link before the first checkbox
testPageDocument.querySelector('#beforelink').focus();

user: Navigate forwards into the checkbox group. Note: You may need to press certain commands (such as Control+Option+Command+J) multiple times to hear all information relating to the checkbox.
instructions.raw: Navigate forwards into the checkbox group. Note: You may need to press certain commands (such as Control+Option+Command+J) multiple times to hear all information relating to the checkbox.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.
